cryingghasts-fabric.duskconfig.title: Crying Ghasts Config
cryingghasts-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_maxD: The maximum distance in blocks the player can be away from the ghasts in order for them to start dropping tears periodically.
cryingghasts-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_ghas: The delay in between ghasts dropping a tear in ticks (1 second = 20 ticks).
